Description: The HOROW Smart Toilet Bidet System gives your bathroom an upgrade that's easy to install. Item Name: HOROW Tankless Elongated Smart Toilet Bidet in White with Auto Flush, Heated Seat, Warm Air Dryer, Bubble Infusion Wash

Description: This white one-piece toilet by Glacier Bay occupies minimal space while offering the spaciousness of an elongated bowl. Item Name: Glacier Bay McClure 12 inch Rough In One-Piece 1.1 GPF/1.6 GPF Dual Flush Elongated Toilet in White Seat Included

Description: The Whisper Choice DC exhaust fan with Pick-A-Flow CFM allows you to choose your airflow, 80 or 110 CFM. In addition to bathrooms, this fan is your ventilation solution for medium-to-large sized rooms - laundry room, sunroom, basement, or garage.
Item Name: Panasonic Whisper Choice DC Pick-A-Flow 80/110 CFM Ceiling Bathroom Exhaust Fan with Flex-Z Fast Bracket

Description: Trusted for years by professionals, Highline toilets are KOHLER's bestselling toilet family. Coupled with KOHLER's powerful canister flush valve, there's no sacrificing performance for design. Item Name: KOHLER Highline Arc 12 in. Rough In 2-Piece 1.28 GFP Single Flush Elongated Chair Height Toilet in White with Soft Close Seat

Description: Replace your old toilet with the Power Flush 2-piece 1.28 GPF High-Efficiency Single Flush Elongated Toilet Featuring Niagara Stealth Technology in White. This toilet has achieved a quiet, powerful and proven flush saving thousands of gallons with no change in consumer use or behavior. The flapper less design means no costly flapper, chains or levers to replace and no leaks ever. Also, this toilet virtually eliminates all refill noise as the fill valve is never exposed.
Item Name: Glacier Bay Power Flush 12 inch Rough In Two-Piece 1.28 GPF Single Flush Elongated Toilet in White Seat Included

Description: TOTO Drake 2-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF Universal Height Toilet with and SoftClose Seat, is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. Featuring TOTO's , a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes , a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. coupled with, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the TOTO Drake is designed in TOTO's Universal Height, which allows for a more comfortable seat position across a wide range of users. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever, is ADA compliant, and meets the standards for EPA WaterSense, and California's CEC and CALGreen requirements. The Drake 2-piece toilet includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, toilet bolt caps and SoftClose toilet seat. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts and water supply lines.
